segments.text: What can I do for you , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am Tim Green in Room 1021 and I want a wake-up call at five thirty AM tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I see . five thirty AM Mr . Green , Room 1021 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to change my wake-up time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , could you tell me your room number and your name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And when would you want us call you this time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , six thirty AM . We will call you exactly on that time .
segments.speaker: S1
